name: paw-and-paper
description: A Discord Bot for roleplay communities, featuring a community-based interactive RPG and powerful tools to roleplay

scripts.start: git pull origin stable && npm update && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pm2 start dist/index.js --name paw --time
scripts.reload: git pull origin stable && npm update && tsc -p tsconfig.json && pm2 reload paw

author: Maksi
